content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences, but here are some of the most popular online yoga platforms that I generally come across:

1. Yoga International: offers a library of classes for all levels, styles, and durations. 2. Gaia: offers an extensive collection of classes on yoga, meditation, mindfulness and other forms of alternative healing. 3. YogaWorks: offers a variety of live classes as well as on-demand classes for all levels and styles. 4. DailyBurn: offers a variety of workout classes including yoga, pilates, and cardio classes. 5. Alo Moves: offers a wide range of yoga classes, guided meditations, and wellness content from renowned teachers. 6. Down Dog: offers customized yoga practices based on your level, goals, and time availability. Remember to choose the online platform that offers the style of yoga you're interested in and a teacher that resonates with you. Some platforms provide free trials, so you can try them out before subscribing.
